short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for details of a board game using multiple websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Board Game Finder - Your Quick Board Game Research Companion

Instantly search multiple board gaming websites to find detailed information about any board game! This extension helps you:

• Compare prices and availability across different retailers
• Access BoardGameGeek ratings and reviews with one click
• Find rules explanations and gameplay videos
• Discover similar games you might enjoy
• Save time by searching multiple sites simultaneously

Perfect for board game enthusiasts, collectors, and anyone looking to learn more about specific games before making a purchase.

Simply highlight a game's name on any webpage or click the extension icon to start your search. Board Game Finder will open organized tabs with relevant information from trusted board gaming websites.

Save time on research and spend more time playing!
